resources.string: This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[it]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[it]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[it]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[it]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[it]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[it]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase
[it]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[it]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials
Campo Dati vuoto o non valido
Inserire nel corpo il testo di grandi dimensioni specifico della proposta
Inserire qui il titolo specifico della proposta
I valori dei parametri inseriti o selezionati non sono validi. Selezionare valori dei parametri corretti e riavviare
[it]I allow Philips to store binary data
[it]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[it]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[it]The actual content of the binary consent help text here
[it]I allow Philips to collect my app data to help the app to function, to improve the app, to personalize the app, to integrate with social media and to show relevant content and advertisement.

[it]Cookie Notice
This App uses Adobe Analytics, an analytics service (“Adobe Analytics”) provided by Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited (“Adobe”). Adobe Analytics uses “cookies” or similar techniques, which are text files placed in your App, in order to help the App to analyze overall traffic patterns through our App. By transmitting the information generated by the cookie about the use of the App to Adobe, setting ensures that IP address is anonymized before geo-localization und will be replaced by a generic IP address before storage. On behalf of Philips, Adobe will use this information for the evaluation of your use of the App, compiling reports on App activity for Philips, and in order to provide other services relating to App activity and use of the App to Philips. Adobe will not associate your IP address with any other data held by Adobe. You can prevent Adobe’s and Philips collection and use of data (cookies and IP address) if you opt-out after you close this screen.
[it]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here

[it]As a result of your consent, Philips group companies may contact you with promotional communications via email, SMS and other digital channels, such as mobile apps and social media. To be able to tailor the communications to your preferences and behavior and provide you with the best, personalized experience, we may analyze and combine your personal data. This data may include: 

Data you give us
Data that you want to actively share with us such as: your name, date of birth or age, email address, physical address, country, gender, phone number, social media profile.

Data we get from your interactions with Philips
Data about your interactions and usage of the Philips digital channels, such as social media, websites, emails, apps and connected products. This data may include: IP address, cookies, device information, communications you click on, location details, and websites you visit

Philips will give you the opportunity to withdraw your consent at any time.
For more information, please read the Philips Privacy notice and the Philips Cookie notice.
[it]The actual content of the moment consent help text here
[it]The actual content of the research and analytics consent help text here
[it]I allow Philips to store my data in cloud
[it]I allow Philips to use my data for Research and Analytics purposes
[it]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[it]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions product informations and reviews.
Estendi la garanzia per altri 24 mesi. Ricevi uno sconto del 10% sui prodotti acquistati nel negozio Philips. Ricevi gratis accessori per il prodotto
Abbiamo inviato un\'e-mail con il contratto di estensione della garanzia al tuo indirizzo e-mail
Il tuo periodo di garanzia è stato esteso fino al prossimo anno
Ricevi comunicazioni promozionali Philips in base alle tue preferenze e al tuo comportamento di acquisto online
La configurazione è modificabile solo all\'avvio. Riavvia l\'applicazione per effettuare modifiche
Si è verificato un errore durante l\'aggiornamento delle informazioni in Dati utente. Riprovare più tardi
[it]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[it]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 Platform.
[it]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[it]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[it]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor & improve your proposition.
[it]The Security & Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rules.
[it]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[it]Functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.

[it]This app integrates the common components to development new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
Accesso non eseguito. Andare a Impostazioni e selezionare Accedi
